mapper.select: SELECT c.complain_no ,c.complain_dt ,c.complain_title ,c.complain_content ,c.complain_request ,c.upload_dt ,c.progress ,c.complain_type ,c.customer_name ,c.phone ,p.company_no ,p.company_name FROM complains c JOIN companys p ON c.company_no = p.company_no ORDER BY c.company_no

SELECT c.complain_no ,c.complain_dt ,c.complain_title ,c.complain_content ,c.complain_request ,c.upload_dt ,c.progress ,c.complain_type ,c.customer_name ,c.phone ,p.company_no ,p.company_name FROM complains c JOIN companys p ON c.company_no = p.company_no WHERE complain_no = #{complainNo}
